subNodes.conversationText: root
<FirstName>, I hoped you would find me here.
We have been looking for you for days now.  Rillian told us we could find you here.
Well hello there Miki...you must have been worried about me?
Continue
Oh please, as egotistical as ever. We were all worried about you.
Continue
You don't need to be coy with me...
Continue
What, you think that I am interested in you now that you dye your hair?
Continue
I don't dye my hair...these purple highlights are natural.
Continue
Well, you seem to be your old self, nothing has changed.
Continue
It is good to see you too Miki...now <brother/sister>, where were we...oh, yes...
Continue
I assume you know that this is where we were attacked.
We read your letter.
Then I am sure you understand why I must find our friends, my companions.
Yes, and we shall travel together to free them if they yet live or avenge them if they have fallen.
Wonderful, I think I know which way they went.
Continue
We should head south to the South Grimstan Forest just south of here.
End Dialog
We will find them brother, you must return home and take care of mother.  She has become very ill and I know that you can help her recover.
I trust you, <brother/sister>.  If you are confident that you can remain safe, I will return to Brinsby and take care of mother.
We will find our friends and free them.
I think I know which way they went.  You must travel to the South Grimstan Forest just south of here.
Alright, we will meet you in Brinsby shortly.
farewell <brother/sister>, and be careful.
End Dialog
I assume you know that this is where we were attacked.
What can I do for you, <FirstName>?
I'd like to ask you some questions.
What would you like to know?
Tell me more about what happened to you and your companions.
We had been traveling and searching for clues for days before coming across Sildor and Sandur near the Stankin Mountains.
Continue
They warned us of the dangers that now lurked in the Dark Woods.
Continue
We thought of taking the river road to the south, but in the end we headed for the Dark Woods.
Continue
Years ago when father and his group passed through this region, they would have taken the Dark Woods path...It was safe back then.
Continue
We set up camp after a days journey.  In the middle of the night, we were ambushed by a large army of orcs.
Continue
Loren and Ikyl, who were on watch, went down first.  I fought off as many as I could, but was struck from behind.
Continue
I remember going in and out of consciousness.  I saw them take Ulrind, Derik, Julend, and Boone as prisoners.
Continue
Then I woke up to a number of Western Elves coming to my aid.
That is horrible Ian.
I still have nightmares, images of my friends falling and in pain.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask me?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Were you able to learn anything more about father's caravan?
Not much.  There were a few clues that led us to believe that they passed through the Dark Woods and were heading for the Grimstan Mountains.
Continue
We were heading in that direction before the orc attacks.
Continue
Anyway, that is all we know right now.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
After everything that has happened, do you still intend to search for father?
Of course.  I will not give up until I learn of his fate.
Continue
Even if that means I must go alone.
If you do go, you will not go alone, for I would go with you.
You have learned much in your short travels and I would love to have your company.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
I don't think that would be wise, but you are capable of taking care of yourself.
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Do you have any ideas to the source of the river's poisoning?
I'm not sure, but it is not an accident.
Continue
This poison has a feel of magic to it.
So you think there is some evil plot behind it?
Definitely...
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to ask me?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Do you think we will be able to free father?
Of course...we've handle ourselves well so far on this journey.
Continue
Fate is on our side...
It is good to have your optimism around, brother.
Brave men only die once.
You're right, let's hope we arrive there in time.
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
Yes...
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Nothing right now, Ian.
Nothing right now, Ian.
